verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Find rest my soul
In Christ alone.
Know His power
In quietness and trust.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When the oceans rise and thunders roar,
I will soar with you above the storm.
Father You are King over the flood.
I will be still know You are God.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hide me now
Under Your wing.
Cover me
Within Your might hand.
